Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl
          Use org.easymock.classextension.EasyMock instead 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createControl(Class, Class[], Object[])
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createControl(Class) 
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createControl(Class, Class[], Object[], Method[])
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createControl(Class, Method[]) 
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createNiceControl(Class, Class[], Object[])
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createNiceControl(Class) 
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createNiceControl(Class, Class[], Object[], Method...)
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createNiceControl(Class, Method[]) 
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createStrictControl(Class, Class[], Object[])
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createStrictControl(Class) 
org.easymock.classextension.MockClassControl.createStrictControl(Class, Class[], Object[], Method...)
          No need to pick a constructor anymore. Constructor arguments are now ignored. Just use createStrictControl(Class, Method[])
